### USAGE ###
>        /api/v1
>        /slave(1)/api/v1

### TL;DR; ###
Endpoint for API calls against the agent.

### DESCRIPTION ###
Returns 200 OK if the call is successful


### AUTHENTICATION ###
This endpoint requires authentication iff HTTP authentication is
enabled.
